post:
eMonsterhost, Inc is proud to offer our top of the line shared cPanel hosting plans, powered on Dual Xeon 3.0 GHz servers, with bandwidth coming from AT&T and Savvis. Not only do you get a superior network, but you also get to take advantage of true 24/7 friendly customer support, All plans are 100% fully managed and supported. Each plan comes with the latest cPanel and Fantastico DeLuxe with hundreds of great scripts to help utilize your website, and these scripts install in a few clicks. Any customer that partakes in our affiliate program also qualifies for FREE web hosting and a great opportunity to make money.

Our plans are competitive and well priced. We do NOT oversell our servers as that leads to bad business like some hosts will do. We stand by our guarantee to you 100%. eMonsterhost is one of Wisconsin's top web hosting and domain registration providers. We do not have any setup fees and we also accept PayPal and credit card. eMonsterhost, Inc. has been serving web hosting and domain registration since 2002. Still not convinced that eMonsterhost is the right company for you? Have a look at just some of our reviews from popular sites:

Receive 2 months of free hosting when you sign-up! cPanel /w Fantastico & over 650 FREE scripts & websites!


In addition to our reviews, you can view our up-time here



eMonsterhost Web Hosting Plans:

Purchase a plan by the year and get 2 months free!

$1 Plan - 200 MB Space - 1 GB Transfer - ($1/mo or $10/yr)

Starter-Lite Plan - 500 MB Space - 5 GB Transfer ($4.99/mo or $49.50/yr)

Starter Plan - 5 GB Space - 150 GB Transfer ($7.95/mo or $79.50/yr)

Standard Plan - 10 GB Space - 400 GB Transfer ($9.95/mo or $99.50/yr)

Professional Plan - 25GB Space - 500GB Transfer ($14.95/mo or $149.50/yr)


All Plans Include The Following Features:

* cPanel 11 + Fantastico DeLuxe
* Support for WordPress, Joomla, Mambo & Many Others!
* eCommerce Shopping Cart Software Including CubeCart, osCommerce, OS Cart, ZenCart & More!
* 100's of scripts ready to be installed
* 650+ Free Websites and Templates
* Support International Domain Names & Many Other TLD's
* POP3/POP3 Secure Email Support Unlimited
* IMAP/Secure IMAP Email Support Unlimited
* Forwarding Email Accounts Unlimited
* Email Auto responders Unlimited
* Add-on Domains
* Parked Domains Unlimited
* Sub-domains
* Additional FTP Accounts Unlimited
* MySQL Databases
* Frontpage 2000/2002/2003 Extensions
* Account "Control Panel" cPanel
* FTP Access Unlimited Accounts
* Anonymous FTP
* Webmail (Browser based which includes: NeoMail, SquirelMail, Horde)
* Log Files + Site Stats
* Customizable Error Pages
* Spam Assassin Protection
* Web File Manager
* Custom Cron jobs
* Hotlink Protection

If you wish to have a custom plan, we are happy to work with you in any way you see fit.


Please either PM me or email us at: support@emonsterhost.com to have your account setup right away.
